Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $11000. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 48 hours. Don't miss this opportunity to secure a valuable asset at an attractive discount. If you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
